sgfx::IconSystem Class Reference

Documentation

This class manages icon data (sg_icon_t) that is installed in the system.

Static Public Member Functions

static const sg_icon_t * get_icon (u32 icon)
 
static bool load_icons (const sg_icon_t *icons, u32 count)
 

Member Function Documentation

Load the system icon specified by the location in the icon table.

)
static

This initializes the system graphics table.

Parameters
